title: Coinbase, Beyond Meat, Block, Etsy, Farfetch: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Coinbase’s income more than quadrupled; Etsy delivered an earnings beat
body:
Stock futures gained after the Kremlin agreed to talks with the Ukraine government, saying Moscow was willing to send a delegation to the Belarusian capital, Minsk. (live blog here). Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
